programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the search for a revenge-for-hire crime ring, Benson and Stabler combine forces on a case that has now spread globally; Fin and Bruno help a victim assaulted a second time; Jet's plan to hack the dark web backfires and puts the team in danger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Benson teams up with the FBI on an unsolved case, Fin and Velasco investigate a flash mob robbery that led to a sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Chief McGrath's daughter discloses a sexual assault, Benson must balance the intricacies of the investigation with McGrath's impulsive actions.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry has to prove himself to someone from his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gang member is pushed from a rooftop in what appears to be retribution for a sexual assault, but when the assault victim also turns up dead, the detectives realize the case is far more complicated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler struggles to keep his emotions in check as he interrogates a man (Matthew Modine) suspected in the murder of a teenage girl -- a man he once let get away on similar charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two police officers in separate precincts attack their wives and demonstrate suicidal behavior, Benson and Stabler suspect a malaria drug both men received while serving in a reserve unit in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a baby boy is discovered in the trash, Benson and Stabler use a bar T-shirt found at the scene to link the crime to a well-to-do college student.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Money and greed tear two close-knit California families apart.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Money and greed tear two close-knit California families apart.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team tracks a highly-skilled assailant determined to avenge her father's death by killing a Brazilian diplomat.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates a ransomware attack that disrupts the entire power grid and paralyzes the city; Sam struggles to find a way for his family to celebrate the holidays after his wife's death.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After napalm is detected at a crime scene, the team investigates the sole casualty for possible links to terrorism.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate a school shooting that left three students dead and link the rifle used in the killings to a gun store serving as the headquarters of a white supremacist group.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of rapes is linked to a speed-dating service, Benson goes under cover and discovers Mike Jergens (Dean Cain) is the assailant.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a runaway teenage girl is found badly beaten, doctors discover the beating killed her unborn child, and detectives begin to question the father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the near-fatal beating of a 12-year-old boy uncovers a female suspect whose trial becomes about the rights of same-sex parents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the accused killer of a teen's mother is released due to lack of evidence, the youth exacts his own justice by killing the man.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a baby boy is discovered in the trash, Benson and Stabler use a bar T-shirt found at the scene to link the crime to a well-to-do college student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives discover that the body of a young woman, found murdered in her apartment, is that of a lawyer who secretly moonlights as a stripper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three cocky prep-school teens are prime suspects when a high-school student from Montreal vanishes during a class trip to New York.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cryptic message sends SVU on a new track to find Maddie; Benson tries to help a federal agent when the case hits too close to home; Capt. Curry tries to make amends with Fin.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: To identify a woman's attacker, the SVU must track down a mysterious suspect targeting tourists staying in hostels.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A brutal assault in the street leads Carisi to pursue hate crime charges; Benson must support a homebound witness who is too scared to speak up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation; Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad is on edge as Carisi waits for a verdict in Maddie's kidnapping case; Benson tries to help the Flynn family pick up the pieces of their broken life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding; Rollins pitches in on her day off.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sister's disappearance; Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder; Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son; Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

programme.desc: Detectives investigate a school shooting that left three students dead and link the rifle used in the killings to a gun store serving as the headquarters of a white supremacist group.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Returning from furlough, Torres goes under cover in a tense and high-stakes drug trafficking case.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater turns to an unlikely source of support when a string of jewelry store robberies shakes his confidence.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence teams up with ASA Chapman to take on an abduction case involving a teenager; the case hits close to home for Voight, leading him to take a personal interest in finding justice for the victim.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: An ongoing case hits close to home for Voight as Intelligence teams up with an SVU detective to track down a prolific offender.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Upton brings SVU detective Petrovic back into the fold to help with the investigation of a tender-age kidnapping.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Torres' personal involvement with an informant jeopardizes his safety and threatens to expose an undercover operation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The members of Firehouse 51 struggle to cope when one of their own dies in a fire; as Lts. Casey and Severide blame each other for the tragedy, Casey also secretly goes through a separation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey must decide whether to turn in a cop's son who paralyzed a teen in a drunken-driving accident; Severide learns he has a fractured vertebra; Mills is torn between his mother and the job.

programme.desc: Chief Boden faces accusations that he abandoned a homeless man to die in a warehouse fire; Severide helps an elderly woman; Detective Voight tries to convince Casey not to testify against his son; Shay has to face her ex during a call.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson receives help from a girl she saved; Detective Voight is determined to get Casey to retract his statement.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto3 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Britain's Scott Ogden will be looking to ride to his first victory of the season.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto2 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Can Britain's Jake Dixon claim a third win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Sprint Race at the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Can anyone stop Marc Marquez from claiming an 11th Sprint win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Ducati's Marc Marquez will be chasing a fifth consecutive Grand Prix win.

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno.

programme.title: FIA TCR World Tour
programme.desc: A look back at the best action from the 2025 TCR World Tour at Circuito Internacional in Vila Real, Portugal.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the opening weekend of the 2024/25 Premier League season as newly promoted Ipswich Town welcome Arne Slot's Liverpool to Portman Road.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Fabian Hurzeler's Brighton host Manchester United at Amex Stadium. Brighton have won four of their last five league games against the Red Devils.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Arsenal face Fabian Hurzeler's Brighton at Emirates Stadium. Both sides have won their first two league games of the season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Southampton welcome Manchester United to St Mary's Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as West Ham United host their local rivals Chelsea at London Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Manchester City at St James' Park. Newcastle have won just one of their last 33 top-flight games against City.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Crystal Palace face Liverpool at Selhurst Park. Oliver Glasner's Palace are still looking for their first league win of the season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Premier League action from the London derby between Tottenham and West Ham United at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Spurs have lost four of their last six London derbies in the league.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie foo

programme.title: SailGP
programme.desc: SailGP Highlights from the 2025 Emirates Great Britain Sail Grand Prix, as a fleet of 12 F50s battle it out for victory in the tumultuous waters of the Solent.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from stage 16 of the 2025 Tour de France, as the riders face a 171km route from Montpellier to the top of Mont Ventoux. Who will thrive on the famed Beast of Provence?

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: We review all the action from the Tour de France up until the second rest day. Also, we look ahead to the 2025 Tour de France Femme.

programme.title: Race Bikes
programme.desc: In the 1990's, Jeff Steber created what was widely credited as being the first ever downhill bike. Shaun Palmer, one of the sport's most important athletes, secured its legacy.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: This documentary looks back on the incredible life of two-time world champion Barry Sheene 20 years on from his death.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto3 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Britain's Scott Ogden will be looking to ride to his first victory of the season.

programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto2 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Can Britain's Jake Dixon claim a third win of the season?

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: A look back at a classic Premier League clash.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2014/15 New Year's Day Premier League meeting between Tottenham and Chelsea at White Hart Lane, featuring eight goals in total, including two for in-form Harry Kane.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We relive this six-goal classic between Manchester United and Manchester City from the 2014/15 season. Sergio Aguero got the visitors off to a flying start.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: West Ham and Arsenal locked horns in the Premier League at Upton Park. This London derby took on added significance with both clubs in the hunt for a Champions League spot.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit this Boxing Day clash between Bournemouth and West Ham. Marko Arnautovic and Callum Wilson were among the scorers in this six-goal thriller.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Mikel Arteta's Arsenal at St. James' Park. The Magpies are winless in their last five league games.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Arne Slot's Liverpool face Unai Emery's Aston Villa at Anfield. Liverpool have won five of their last six home games against the Villans.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Leicester City welcome Enzo Maresca's Chelsea to King Power Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Premier League action as Everton face table toppers Liverpool in the final league Merseyside derby at Goodison Park. The Toffees claimed a 2-0 win in this fixture last season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Ange Postecoglou's out-of-form Tottenham travel to face bottom side Southampton at St Mary's Stadium. The Saints have won just one of their last 28 Premier League games.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Pep Guardiola's struggling Manchester City travel to the West Midlands to face an Aston Villa side who beat them 1-0 at Villa Park last season.

programme.desc: Action from the 2025 UEFA Champions League final between Luis Enrique's Paris Saint-Germain and Simone Inzaghi's Inter at Allianz Arena.

programme.desc: Action from the 2025 UEFA Conference League final between Manuel Pellegrini's Real Betis and Enzo Maresca's Chelsea at Stadion Wroclaw.

programme.title: UEFA Europa League Football
programme.desc: Action from the 2025 UEFA Europa League final between Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester United at San Mames Stadium in Bilbao.

programme.title: Ultimate Pool Pairs Cup
programme.desc: Ultimate Pool action from Group 10 of the Pairs Cup.

programme.title: What Went Down
programme.desc: Adam Catterall is joined by UFC featherweight fighter Alexander Volkanovski to rewatch his biggest moments in the Octagon, including his debut win and his battles with Islam Makhachev.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: A review of UFC 318 at Smoothie King Center, New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against old foe Max Holloway.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles meet Richmond at Optus Stadium. The Tigers won 90-81 when these sides last met in round nine.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League Geelong Cats face St Kilda at GMHBA Stadium. The Cats have lost their past two meetings with the Saints.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as ladder leaders Collingwood play Fremantle at the MCG. The Magpies won 97-83 when these sides last met.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Australian Football League action as Adelaide Crows face Gold Coast Suns at Adelaide Oval. The Suns have lost all 11 matches they have played at this venue.

programme.title: Australian Rules

programme.desc: Australian Football League action as Hawthorn go head-to-head with Port Adelaide at UTAS Stadium. The Power have won their past four matches against the Hawks.

programme.title: Australian Rules

programme.title: Australian Rules
